item.description:
**THIS EVENT IS HOSTED BY SARAH and CHERYL**

Come out this Friday as we celebrate Sarah's birthday at The Good Life! We will be there for drinks and head out afterwards to a nearby club. The Good Life has gone through a complete makeover from run down Irish bar to upscale lounge hangout - definitely worth checking out.

The Plan: Meet around 8:30pm @ The Good Life (28 Kingston St, near Downtown Crossing/Financial District, 617.451.2622) Look for us in the upstairs bar or in the back lounge (downstairs). If you have trouble finding the place or meeting the group, please call 989.385.1830.

T Stops: Park Street (Green, Red lines), Downtown Crossing (Red, Orange)

See you there!

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Birthday Celebration @ The Good Life THIS FRIDAY!
